video.title: Fixer Upper
video.synopsis: Join Texas design experts Chip and Joanna Gaines as they help homebuyers turn less-than-perfect properties into dream houses.

episodes.synopsis: Chip and Joanna help a couple pick a fixer-upper in Castle Heights, an upscale Waco neighborhood that's full of mansions.
episodes.title: Looking Old but Feeling New

episodes.synopsis: Chip and Joanna take Chuck and Charmaine on a tour of Waco's historic Sanger Heights neighborhood, which is undergoing a revitalization.
episodes.title: Young Family Takes on History

episodes.synopsis: Heath and Becky Ivy tour Woodway, Texas, in search of a home to accommodate his growing business and their growing family.
episodes.title: Nomad Family Seeks Final Home

episodes.synopsis: After a tough divorce, single mom Karla turns to Chip and Joanna for help in finding the right home to start life's next chapter.
episodes.title: New Home New Life for Mom

episodes.synopsis: Chip and Joanna help Carolyn Muska, who lost her home and her husband in a tragic fertilizer plant explosion, start the next chapter of her life.
episodes.title: Client Rebuilds After Tragedy

episodes.synopsis: A Waco couple expecting their first child seeks Chip and Joanna's help in finding a home with plenty of bedrooms inside and plenty of acreage outside.
episodes.title: Academics Seek Acreage

episodes.synopsis: Three grown siblings seek a home for their parents, missionaries who spend nearly all their time overseas and need a stateside retreat.
episodes.title: Missionaries Retreat in Waco

episodes.synopsis: A doctor and his active, outdoorsy family recruit Chip and Joanna to help them find a European-inspired home near Lake Waco.
episodes.title: French Country Sought in Waco

episodes.synopsis: Married doctors with three kids of their own are on the lookout for a farmhouse big enough to fill with plenty of foster children.
episodes.title: Physicians Seek Farmhouse

episodes.synopsis: Returning to Texas from Oklahoma, Chip and Joanna help a couple find a house with Lone Star style that doesn't go overboard.
episodes.title: Texan Family Returns to Roots

episodes.synopsis: Chip and Joanna show big-city dwellers Clint and Kelly Harp the Brook Oaks neighborhood in hopes of finding an urban-style home.
episodes.title: Craftsmen Crave Urban Feel

episodes.synopsis: A young couple is determined to move into a neighborhood where houses seldom go up for sale. Can Chip and Joanna conjure up a miracle?
episodes.title: Couple Reach for Unreachable

episodes.synopsis: A pair of baby boomer newlyweds look to Chip and Joanna for help finding the right home to accommodate their active lifestyles.
episodes.title: Baby Boomers Buy Fixer Upper

episodes.synopsis: Chip and Joanna try to give their young clients everything they're looking for, including a fixer-upper that's close to their coffee business.
episodes.title: Newlyweds Seek First Home

episodes.synopsis: First-time homebuyers fall for a fixer-upper in an established neighborhood that's known for big lots. But the renovation also brings big problems.
episodes.title: Young Couple Chooses Old Home

episodes.synopsis: A homebuilder and a real estate agent are reluctant to look at fixer-uppers until Joanna and Chip convince them there's serious potential.
episodes.title: Homebuilders Seek Fixer Upper

episodes.synopsis: A couple with a nearly empty nest wants a roomy fixer-upper on the water with plenty of extra space for visiting family.
episodes.title: Extra Space for Blended Family

episodes.synopsis: A new baby's imminent arrival puts pressure on Chip and Joanna to find the perfect fixer-upper for their expectant clients.
episodes.title: Expectant Couple Seeks Nest

episodes.synopsis: When an old high school friend moves back to Texas, Joanna and Chip step in to help his family find the perfect fixer-upper.
episodes.title: High School Friend Seeks Fixer

episodes.synopsis: Though their nest is nearly empty, these clients need a fixer-upper that's big enough to hold an entire football team. Can Chip and Joanna deliver?
episodes.title: Sports Chaplain Tackles Fixer

episodes.synopsis: A young couple making the transition from renting to buying fear the hidden costs of renovating a historic fixer-upper.
episodes.title: New Homebuyers Prefer Fixer

episodes.synopsis: A large family with a new baby on the way wants a funky fixer-upper in an established neighborhood. But the options give them a lot to think about.
episodes.title: Couple Seeks a Unique Fixer

episodes.synopsis: Putting three generations under one roof is a new challenge for Chip and Joanna, but it's nothing they can't handle.
episodes.title: Three Generations, One Fixer

episodes.synopsis: Chip and Joanna scope out some small-town options for a large family from the country who've outgrown their current floor plan.
episodes.title: Country Couple Seeks Fixer

episodes.synopsis: A couple who've lived on a tiny island for years want to stay near the water when they move to Texas. But can Chip and Joanna make it happen?
episodes.title: Island Family Seeks Space

episodes.synopsis: A family with a generous budget and a taste for French country decor shops for a spacious home with hidden potential in Waco, Texas.
episodes.title: Family Fancies French Flair
